title: Driving Faith
description:
- Driving Faith. An Entertaining & Christian Sci-Fi Adventure Like No Other. -
This story takes place in the not-too-distant future. A high-tech future, ruled by Cancel Culture and overrun with rampant A.I.In this cutting edge world, the government has proudly created an Internet Firewall.This virtual “wall” prevents all religious freedom on the World Wide Web.There are many who approve of the wall, like Tom Wylie, a self-proclaimed atheist……and there are many who do not. Those who oppose are looked at as cyber-criminals and terrorists. They are threatened with the death penalty when caught.When Tom comes face to face with a faith-filled believer with a bold plan to oppose the government by dismantling the wall, he dismisses him.The reason?The idea comes from his robot. An android chauffeur who was supposedly designed to just drive him around…not to drive him crazy.If you enjoyed Speculative Christian Fiction like Left Behind, or Classic Science Fiction like 1984, you'll love this thrilling adventure that has it all…with a small slice of humor thrown in for good measure.Purchase it now and experience a story full of suspense, powerful emotions, possible smiles, and a strong conflict that will keep you on the edge of your seat!
author: Gabriel  Perez
